alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Orange; Western Addison (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 14 at 3:13PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Heavy snow showers will impact portions of southern Lamoille, north central Orange, southwestern Caledonia, north central Addison, southeastern Chittenden and Washington Counties through 400 PM EST... At 312 PM EST, snow showers were reported over Middlesex, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Visibility less than a quarter mile, and snow accumulation 1 to 2 inches per hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Very low visibility will pose a hazard to motorists. Rapidly accumulating snow will make travel difficult. Locations impacted include... Barre, Montpelier, Calais, Plainfield, Stowe, Waterbury Village, Websterville, East Montpelier, Marshfield Village, Waitsfield, Berlin, Fayston, Worcester, Middlesex, Marshfield, Bolton, Cabot Village, Barre Town, Northfield Village, and Huntington. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 45 and 72.
info.instruction: Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Orange; Western Addison
